author: agrohsje
body:
#### PR description:
Modified setting names for CPx tunes adjusted to 13.6 TeV. Reason is simpler handling for common background production. Discussed in the original PR:
https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/38358#issuecomment-1165540772

#### PR validation:
Checked that nothing was touched and only file names changed in the PR. Compared on top settings to MCTunes2017 to see difference discussed on p6:
https://indico.cern.ch/event/1169048/contributions/4909711/attachments/2456268/4210106/2022_June6_GEN_CPXnormForRun3_SercanSen.pdf
title: fixing names in fragments for 13p6 CPx tunes
